readable.content: Three girls are posing for a picture beside a dresser in front of a decorated Christmas tree . Three women are posing for a photo in front of a christmas tree Three women are posing together in front of a Christmas tree . Three women one of which is holding a paper cup posing in front of a Christmas tree . Three women standing next to each other are smiling in front of a Christmas tree .
